description: Smoked paprika and chilli make this charred baby octopus delicious and spicy.
name: Smoky BBQ Octopus Recipe | Woolworths
recipeIngredient: 0.3 cup white wine, save 2 tsp for later

recipeInstructions.text: Place the octopus in a large bowl with olive oil, white wine, smoked paprika and garlic. Toss well and cover. Set aside to marinade for 30 minutes.
Pre-heat the barbecue to the highest setting. Drain he octopus and tip the marinade into a small saucepan. Bring the marinade to the boil and cook until reduced, 1-2 minutes.
Place the octopus on the grill and cook for 4-5 minutes, turning a couple of times, until the octopus is lightly charred and starts to curl.
Serve with the marinade drizzled on top, cracked black pepper, parsley and lemon wedges.
